verses.verse: And <S%H935><s%>, behold, there came a man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> out of Judah <S%H3063><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> unto Beth-el <S%H1008><s%>: and Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> was standing <S%H5975><s%> by the altar <S%H4196><s%> to burn incense <S%H6999><s%>.

And he cried <S%H7121><s%> against the altar <S%H4196><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, O altar <S%H4196><s%>, altar <S%H4196><s%>, thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Behold <S%H1121><s%>, a son shall be born <S%H3205><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, Josiah <S%H2977><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%>; and upon thee shall he sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> of the high places <S%H1116><s%> that burn incense <S%H6999><s%> upon thee <S%H120><s%>, and men's bones <S%H6106><s%> shall they burn upon thee <S%H8313><s%>.

And he gave <S%H5414><s%> a sign <S%H4159><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, This is the sign <S%H4159><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%>: Behold <S%H4196><s%>, the altar shall be rent <S%H7167><s%>, and the ashes <S%H1880><s%> that are upon it shall be poured out <S%H8210><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H4428><s%>, when the king heard <S%H8085><s%> the saying <S%H1697><s%> of the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, which he cried <S%H7121><s%> against the altar <S%H4196><s%> in Beth-el <S%H1008><s%>, that Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> put forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from the altar <S%H4196><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Lay hold <S%H8610><s%> on him <S%H3027><s%>. And his hand, which he put forth <S%H7971><s%> against him <S%H3001><s%>, dried up, so that he could <S%H3201><s%> not draw it back again to him <S%H7725><s%>.

The altar <S%H4196><s%> also was rent <S%H7167><s%>, and the ashes <S%H1880><s%> poured out <S%H8210><s%> from the altar <S%H4196><s%>, according to the sign <S%H4159><s%> which the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, Entreat <S%H2470><s%> now the favor <S%H6440><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and pray <S%H6419><s%> for me <S%H3027><s%>, that my hand may be restored me again <S%H7725><s%>. And the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> entreated <S%H2470><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and the king <S%H4428><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%> was restored him again <S%H7725><s%>, and became as it was before <S%H7223><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, Come <S%H935><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> with me <S%H5582><s%>, and refresh thyself <S%H5414><s%>, and I will give thee a reward <S%H4991><s%>.

And the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, If thou wilt give <S%H5414><s%> me half <S%H2677><s%> thy house <S%H1004><s%>, I will not go in <S%H935><s%> with thee <S%H398><s%>, neither will I eat bread <S%H3899><s%> nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in this place <S%H4725><s%>;

for so was it charged <S%H6680><s%> me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> no bread <S%H3899><s%>, nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>, neither return <S%H7725><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> that thou camest <S%H1980><s%>.
So he went <S%H3212><s%> another <S%H312><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, and returned <S%H7725><s%> not by the way <S%H1870><s%> that he came <S%H935><s%> to Beth-el <S%H1008><s%>.

Now there dwelt <S%H3427><s%> an <S%H259><s%> old <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> in Beth-el <S%H1008><s%>; and one of his sons <S%H1121><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5608><s%> him all the works <S%H4639><s%> that the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> in Beth-el <S%H1008><s%>: the words <S%H1697><s%> which he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, them also they told <S%H5608><s%> unto their father <S%H1><s%>.

And their father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto them <S%H1870><s%>, What way went <S%H1980><s%> he <S%H1121><s%>? Now his sons had seen <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H335><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> went <S%H1980><s%>, that came <S%H935><s%> from Judah <S%H3063><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto his sons <S%H1121><s%>, Saddle <S%H2280><s%> me the ass <S%H2543><s%>. So they saddled <S%H2280><s%> him the ass <S%H2543><s%>; and he rode thereon <S%H7392><s%>.

And he went <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, and found <S%H4672><s%> him sitting <S%H3427><s%> under an oak <S%H424><s%>; and he said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H376><s%>, Art thou the man of God <S%H430><s%> that camest <S%H935><s%> from Judah <S%H3063><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%>, I am.
Then he said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3212><s%>, Come home <S%H1004><s%> with me <S%H398><s%>, and eat bread <S%H3899><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, I may <S%H3201><s%> not return <S%H7725><s%> with thee <S%H935><s%>, nor go in with thee <S%H398><s%>; neither will I eat bread <S%H3899><s%> nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> with thee in this place <S%H4725><s%>:

for it was said <S%H1697><s%> to me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> no bread <S%H3899><s%> nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> there <S%H7725><s%>, nor turn again to go <S%H3212><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> that thou camest <S%H1980><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5030><s%>, I also am a prophet as thou art <S%H4397><s%>; and an angel spake <S%H1696><s%> unto me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Bring him back <S%H7725><s%> with thee into thy house <S%H1004><s%>, that he may eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>. But he lied unto him <S%H3584><s%>.
So he went back <S%H7725><s%> with him <S%H398><s%>, and did eat bread <S%H3899><s%> in his house <S%H1004><s%>, and drank <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H3427><s%>, as they sat at the table <S%H7979><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto the prophet <S%H5030><s%> that brought him back <S%H7725><s%>;

and he cried <S%H7121><s%> unto the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> that came <S%H935><s%> from Judah <S%H3063><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Forasmuch as <S%H3282><s%> thou hast been disobedient <S%H4784><s%> unto the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and hast not kept <S%H8104><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> commanded thee <S%H6680><s%>,

but camest back <S%H7725><s%>, and hast eaten <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and drunk <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> of which he said <S%H1696><s%> to thee <S%H398><s%>, Eat no bread <S%H3899><s%>, and drink <S%H8354><s%> no water <S%H4325><s%>; thy body <S%H5038><s%> shall not come <S%H935><s%> unto the sepulchre <S%H6913><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H310><s%>, after he had eaten <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, and after <S%H310><s%> he had drunk <S%H8354><s%>, that he saddled <S%H2280><s%> for him the ass <S%H2543><s%>, to wit <S%H5030><s%>, for the prophet whom he had brought back <S%H7725><s%>.

And when he was gone <S%H3212><s%>, a lion <S%H738><s%> met <S%H4672><s%> him by the way <S%H1870><s%>, and slew <S%H4191><s%> him <S%H5038><s%>: and his body was cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, and the ass <S%H2543><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H681><s%> it <S%H738><s%>; the lion also stood <S%H5975><s%> by the body <S%H5038><s%>.

And <S%H582><s%>, behold, men passed by <S%H5674><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%> the body <S%H5038><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, and the lion <S%H738><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H681><s%> the body <S%H5038><s%>; and they came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H1696><s%> it in the city <S%H5892><s%> where the old <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%>.

And when the prophet <S%H5030><s%> that brought him back <S%H7725><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> thereof <S%H559><s%>, he said, It is the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, who was disobedient <S%H4784><s%> unto the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: therefore Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> him unto the lion <S%H738><s%>, which hath torn <S%H7665><s%> him <S%H4191><s%>, and slain him <S%H1697><s%>, according to the word of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, which he spake unto him <S%H1696><s%>.
And he spake <S%H1696><s%> to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Saddle <S%H2280><s%> me the ass <S%H2543><s%>. And they saddled it <S%H2280><s%>.

And he went <S%H3212><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> his body <S%H5038><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, and the ass <S%H2543><s%> and the lion <S%H738><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H681><s%> the body <S%H5038><s%>: the lion <S%H738><s%> had not eaten <S%H398><s%> the body <S%H5038><s%>, nor torn <S%H7665><s%> the ass <S%H2543><s%>.

And the prophet <S%H5030><s%> took up <S%H5375><s%> the body <S%H5038><s%> of the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, and laid <S%H3240><s%> it upon the ass <S%H2543><s%>, and brought it back <S%H7725><s%>; and he came <S%H935><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%> of the old <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%>, to mourn <S%H5594><s%>, and to bury him <S%H6912><s%>.
And he laid <S%H3240><s%> his body <S%H5038><s%> in his own grave <S%H6913><s%>; and they mourned <S%H5594><s%> over him <S%H1945><s%>, saying, Alas, my brother <S%H251><s%>!

And it came to pass <S%H310><s%>, after he had buried <S%H6912><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, that he spake to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, When I am dead <S%H4191><s%>, then bury <S%H6912><s%> me in the sepulchre <S%H6913><s%> wherein the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> is buried <S%H6912><s%>; lay <S%H3240><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> his bones <S%H6106><s%>.

For the saying <S%H1697><s%> which he cried <S%H7121><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> against the altar <S%H4196><s%> in Beth-el <S%H1008><s%>, and against all the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the high places <S%H1116><s%> which are in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%>, shall surely come to pass.

After <S%H310><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%> Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> not from his evil <S%H7451><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, but made <S%H6213><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> from among all <S%H7098><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> of the high places <S%H1116><s%>: whosoever would <S%H2655><s%>, he consecrated <S%H4390><s%> him <S%H3548><s%>, that there might be priests of the high places <S%H1116><s%>.

And this thing <S%H1697><s%> became sin <S%H2403><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%>, even to cut it off <S%H3582><s%>, and to destroy <S%H8045><s%> it from off the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>.
